trends: There have been no other sightings in Bayside
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw a craft that was cloaked with one bright light forward, one aft, and two red lights in the middle. You could not see any visible outline of a craft as it glided above us.
divs: sighting detailsi was saying goodbye to a friend in my driveway on the outskirts of milwaukee when we both noticed a very bright light approaching from the north\northwest. at first i thought it was a plane as we kept on talking but we soon both realized this was a strange object. the object steadily kept its path and glided 500 feet above us and kept going. the object had a very bright light forward and aft, and had two red lights in the middle-one on each side. the object could have been anywhere from 100-200 feet long, it was hard to tell. what struck me the oddest is that the craft had no visible signs of a fuselage, yet all the lights moved together as one. we both were speechless as it glided away and didn't make any sound. it almost seemed like a cloaked silent helicopter. i was very excited and wanted to talk to my friend on what had just happened but he changed the subject right away and after repeatedly asking him about it did he respond to my questions. turns out he did see the same thing i did but had a hard time talking about it. we lost site of the object as it went over the tree line and headed south\southeast towards milwaukee.
